<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Shaitan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=213)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hailing from the Plane of Earth, shaitans are proud and brazen genies. They value physical skill and love bargaining, games of chance, and working with metal and stone. Immense gemstones and veins of precious metal crisscross their home plane, and the industrious shaitans have built a vast mercantile empire from these abundant natural resources.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Genie_Shaitan.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Shaitan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=213)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Genie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=216" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 164</row>

**Perception** +15; darkvision, [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), tremorsense (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 falchion_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 110

**Resistances**
electricity 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 45 feet, climb 20 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_falchion_ +20 ([forceful +1](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d10+12 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d4+12 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet and shove into stone

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 24
- **2nd**
[Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) (x2)
- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276) (at will)
- **5th**
[Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=355) (self only), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

**Earth Glide**   The shaitan can Burrow through dirt and stone at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

**Shove into Stone**  ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) When the shaitan Pushes a creature into a stone barrier, the target must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or become merged with the barrier (as [_meld with stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=188)). The victim can attempt to Escape (DC 28).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Shaitan Pashas</title>

Shaitan pashas fulfill wishes as efficiently as possible. A wish granted might create a temporary reality—a wish for a pet dragon might find the dragon lasts only a day before it vanishes or dies. Shaitan pashas add the following to their innate spells: **8th** [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95); **6th** [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123), [_stoneskin_ (at will; self only)](/Spells.aspx?ID=312).
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-50" />
name: Shaitan
